artefact: Register as a food retailer or caterer

artefact.overview: Register with your council's environmental health service before you open your business; you have 28 days to register when you open a food retailer or catering business
artefact.introduction: You must register with your council's environmental health service at least 28 days before you open your business.  Find environmental health contact details for your council.

details.description: Labelling and handling food, standards, transporting and more
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.

artefact.title: Sign up for food safety alerts
